Headline: #95 95th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 91st/Burley
ShortDescription: Eastbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd and Buffalo: due to street blockage near 91st/Burley.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Armitage. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier door problem at Armitage.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
